Package UserCode.Interface

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    iBehaviour
    iBehaviour defines the interface for all behaviour objects to have behaviours within the simulation.
    iBehaviourFactory
    iBehaviourFactory used to create the behaviour and pass in the required class to make the behaviour and assign to display
    iDisplay
    iDisplay defines the interface for all displayable objects within the aquarium
    iDisplayFactory
    Interface for the iDisplayFactory used for the factory method
    iFoodManager
    iFoodManager - food manager to manage the food.
    iManager
    iManager acts as the interface for the Manager which enables it to populate the world
    iMouseListener
    iMouseListener listens for mouse input.
    iMousePublisher
    interface iMousePublisher using a observer pattern publishes mouse events to all the listeners
    iMoveX
    iMoveX defines the interface for behaviour objects which will enable the objects to move on the X axis
    iMoveY
    iMoveY defines the interface for behaviour objects which will enable the objects to move on the Y axis
